review: I recommend this game to everyone. This game lets you survive anyway you want, so you either become a lone wolf that is also a walking pinata or band with some friends and terrorize chernarus. I give this game 10/10 salad bowls. P.S prepare for losing precious stuff and entering a brief phase of sadness experience.
